remarks: Distribution of class substitution over implication, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)
statement:
sbcimi.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
sbcimi.2 $e |- ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> ch ) $.
sbcimi.3 $e |- ( [. A / x ]. ps <-> et ) $.
sbcimi $p |- ( [. A / x ]. ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( ch -> et ) ) $.
